name: Intern (VR)
description:
We made this little innocent VR game for HTC Vive back in the Summer of 2017 and haven't released it to the public. We finished working on it right before Charlottesville happened, which is why a lot of the references in the game are outdated (there's Sean Spicer in there, if you remember who that is!)...

Anyway, we hope you enjoy this little nostalgic romp through the White House of 2017. We'll probably update this page with a lot of the art we did for this, as most people don't have an HTC Vive we're guessing?

Oh, btw, pls vote this November 2018. Pls.
